item.title: Dead fox near house, 7th September
item.description:
We noticed dead fox and it smells a lot and I’ve contact Bexley council out of service (call reference: 249946) to see if they offer a removal service as it is weekend no one available. As per their advise I managed put the dead fox in a heavy-duty black plastic bag, tie it securely, and place it in normal waste bin for collection. Could you please arrange some to collect from address: 89 Corbylands Road DA15 8JQ (bin: Green colour waste bin) as soon as possible.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 81, Corbylands Road, Longlands, Sidcup, London
Report on FixMyStreet
